sentences.cn: 有板上声卡的个人电脑

sentences.en: ADSL is always on, which makes your PC much more vulnerable to hacking.
sentences.cn: 一直挂在线上会使你的个人电脑更容易被黑客攻击。

sentences.en: Go over to your PC and boot it up.
I'm experienced in IBM - PC and Great Wall computers.
Idioms that have become accepted on a PC are completely inappropriate on an embedded device.
sentences.cn: 一些适合桌面计算机的术语可能完全不能用在嵌入系统中.

sentences.en: It is possible to communicateseri - ally between distributed MCS —48 and IBM — PC.
sentences.cn: 分散的MCS—48与IBM—PC之间具有串行通信能力.

sentences.en: On PC, the game had it all — imaginative storyline and characters, challenging gameplay, superb graphics.
sentences.cn: 个人电脑里的游戏非常完美，从想象力丰富的故事情节及人物到富有挑战性的游戏设计和精美画面，应有尽有。

sentences.en: PC Dacre knocked on Webb'sdoor and, opening it, stood to one side.
sentences.cn: 警员戴克敲了敲韦布的门，在推开门的同时，闪到了一旁。

sentences.en: PC Keith Gate helped arrest the men.
sentences.cn: 警员基思·盖特协助逮捕了那些人。

sentences.en: People can use their PCs to do their banking from home.
sentences.cn: 人们可以在家通过个人电脑办理银行业务。

sentences.en: The PC comes with office software preloaded.
sentences.cn: 这台电脑随机预装了办公软件。

sentences.en: The price of a PC has fallen by an average of 25% a year since 1982.
sentences.cn: 自1982年以来，个人计算机的单价年均下降25%。

sentences.en: the relative simplicity of the new PC
sentences.cn: 新型个人电脑的相对简易

sentences.en: Use PC control technology to replace the X 6132 milling relay - contactor control.
sentences.cn: 利用PC控制技术取代X6132铣床的继电器 --- 接触器控制.

sentences.en: Users can download MP3 music files and record them directly onto a CD audio disc using a PC CD writer.
sentences.cn: 用户可以下载MP3音乐文件，然后用个人电脑上的光盘刻录机直接刻写在CD音乐光盘上。

sentences.en: Users can download their material to a desktop PC.
sentences.cn: 用户可以把资料下载到台式机上。

phrases.tran_cn: 笔记本电脑；笔记本型个人计算机
abbr. 电脑摄像头（personal computer camera）

trans.tran_cn: personal computer 个人计算机，巡逻车(Patrol Car)

trans.tran_en: a computer that is used by one person at a time, either at home or at work
